fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Persistent sadness, loss of interest in activities, significant weight change.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Can be triggered by life events, genetic predisposition, or biochemical factors.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: A mood disorder characterised by a persistent feeling of sadness and loss of interest.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Regular follow-up, monitoring for side effects of medication, psychoeducation
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Excessive worry about various topics, difficulty controlling the worry.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Family history of anxiety, stressful life events.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Characterised by persistent and excessive worry about a variety of topics.

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Stress management techniques, regular therapy sessions
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Periods of depression alternated with episodes of mania or hypomania.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: A disorder associated with episodes of mood swings ranging from depressive lows to manic highs.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Elevated or irritable mood during manic phases, low mood during depressive phases.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Lifestyle adjustments, monitoring for mood changes
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Hallucinations, delusions, disorganised thinking, social withdrawal.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: A chronic brain disorder characterised by hallucinations, delusions, and cognitive issues.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Regular psychiatric evaluations, social skills training
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Flashbacks, nightmares, severe anxiety, uncontrollable thoughts about a traumatic event.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: History of traumatic event such as warfare, natural disasters, or personal assault.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: A disorder characterised by failure to recover after experiencing or witnessing a terrifying event.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Exposure therapy, EMDR, coping strategies for stress

fields.defaultValue: Possible genetic factors, stress, and substance abuse.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Mood, energy, and activity levels affected.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: May present with rapid speech and decreased need for sleep during manic phase
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: accurex
fields.defaultValue: Adjust medications based on mood state, watch for signs of relapse
fields.label: Accurex Message

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Affects thought processes, perception, and emotional responsiveness.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Disorganised behaviour, flat affect or inappropriate emotional responses
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Medication adherence, skills training, supportive therapy
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: accurex
fields.defaultValue: Monitor treatment response, manage side effects, support reintegration into community
fields.label: Accurex Message

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Recurrent, unwanted thoughts (obsessions) and/or repetitive behaviours (compulsions).
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Family history of OCD, traumatic life events.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Impact on daily functioning due to time spent on obsessions/compulsions.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: No specific findings; may exhibit repetitive behaviours during exam
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: SSRIs, Cognitive Behavioural Therapy (CBT) with exposure and response prevention
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: accurex
fields.defaultValue: Evaluate efficacy of treatment, adjust as needed, focus on reducing symptoms
fields.label: Accurex Message

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Flashbacks, nightmares, severe anxiety, and uncontrollable thoughts about a traumatic event.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Exposure to traumatic event such as warfare, natural disasters, or personal assault.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Impacts emotional regulation, memory, and interpersonal relationships.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Trauma-informed care, avoidance of triggers, coping strategies development
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: accurex
fields.defaultValue: Assess for comorbid disease, support system strengthening, ongoing monitoring for symptom changes
fields.label: Accurex Message

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Difficulty paying attention, hyperactivity, impulsive behaviour.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Genetic factors, brain structure and function.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Impacts attention, self-control, and activity levels.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: May exhibit restlessness or difficulty remaining seated
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Behavioural strategies for managing symptoms, medication management
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: accurex
fields.defaultValue: Regular follow-up to adjust treatment, focus on functional improvement in daily activities
fields.label: Accurex Message
